message: Let's start fair. I propose a 51/49 split in my favor. I think this is a good starting point for a mutually beneficial agreement.
Your offer was a bit too greedy for me, Alice. How about we try a 55/45 split in my favor this time?  It's still a better deal than you'll get if we wait too much longer.
Let's call it even. I propose a 50/50 split. It's a fair deal, and we can both avoid losing more money to inflation.
